Thank you for enrolling in OSiRIS!

Welcome to the Open Storage Research Infrastructure! To finish enrollment there are a couple more steps.

Confirm your email

Please check your email. Your enrollment cannot be completed until you have confirmed your email by clicking the link in the email. You may also copy/paste the link into your browser. The email subject is "Invitation to join OSiRIS".

Already confirmed your email?

Someone from OSiRIS or your virtual organization will need to confirm your enrollment. When it is confirmed you will receive a 2nd email with subject "New Notification for OSiRIS" stating that your petition "changed status from Pending Approval to Approved". Once you have this email you can proceed to login to comanage if necessary. Some OSiRIS use cases do not require any further interaction with COmanage beyond the enrollment, but others may require you to use it to retrieve or upload credentials.

Please have a look at our documentation to get started.

Have not enrolled yet?

If you've ended up at this page but have not initiated enrollment in OSiRIS please have a look at our enrollment instructions. They will provide some background on what OSiRIS is and point you to the enrollment gateway.
